title: (48100) Mungia - 4 Atxurizubi Kalea
description: Public toilets

title: (48100) Mungia - 2A Atxurizubi Kalea
description: Laundry belonging to the Eroski Supermarket which is on the same corner

title: (48100) Mungia - 16A Kalea Atxurizubi
description: Large esplanade where you can park the motorhome. Fountain about 150 meters. There is no WC in the same parking lot, but it is close (about 100m). Ideal for visiting Olentzero's house. Laundry at 300m. At present, you cannot access the parking on weekends and holidays after 22:00 or leave before 06:00.

title: (48100) Mungia - 58B Barrio Larrabizker
description: Parking lot along the road, brand new just built. Not yet paying. No services.

title: (48100) Mungia - 15DUP Lauaxeta Olerkari Kalea
description: Public toilets

title: (48100) Mungia - s/n Landetxo Kalea
description: drinking water fountain

title: (48100) Mungia - 6D Grupo Goizalde Etxe Taldea
description: Quiet parking near the center.

title: (48100) Munguía -
description: Mungia motorhome area

title: (48100) Mungia - 29B Kalea Elorduigoitia
description: Large parking near the village. Very calm. Ideal to spend a night. very nice town. Bus to Bilbao and beaches.

title: (48100) Mungia - s/n Aritz Bidea
description: Alcampo supermarket parking. Undercover, tall height limit. No time limit. Free WiFi from car park. Toilets and Cafe in lobby. Cheap fuel at the Simply gas station.

title: (48100) - 15003 Bermeo Kalea
description: Low cost gas station 10 cents less / liter

title: (48110) Gatika - 10 Garai Auzoa
description: Quiet cemetery parking lot overlooking the meadow on the outskirts of town. A tree provides the only shade in the place. There is a bakery, bar, swimming pool and pintxos nearby in Bilbao. The surface is almost horizontal. At least 8 vehicles fit.

title: (48110) Gatika - 10 Sertutxa Auzoa
description: Quiet parking next to the Gatika sports center. Unbeatable service and beautiful but pleasant views. There are restaurants nearby and a great opportunity to eat and eat in this pretty town square.

title: (48112) - 69C Lugar Barrio Erdigune
description: Free parking ideal for overnight. With grass and very quiet. Very close to the municipal swimming pool.

title: (48110) Gatika - 47 Ugarte Auzoa
description: Quiet place in gatika. It is a parking lot next to wakepark. there is no one and there is hardly any noise. It does not have any services but to spend the night in peace it is very good.

title: (48120) -
description: Public car park on a thoroughfare, relatively quiet location next to a park. Bus stop right on site, rubbish bins available. Children's playground and restaurants in the immediate vicinity. Normal parking bays, no problem with 5.40 cm.

title: (48120) - 3 Meñaka Bidea
description: It is the second car park (right next to the main car park) of Asador Ametza, we were having dinner and asked if we could spend the night in the car park, and they told us "no problem", as long as we left it free for the midday service . Good treatment and good food.

title: (48160) Derio - BI-3715
description: Petronor gas station, LPG/LPG station

title: (48112) Centro - 38E Lugar Barrio Erdigune
description: 2 parking lots in front of the church located at the top of the town .. quite flat and accessible especially for vans and vans .... start of walks ..

title: (48120) Meñaka - 11 Meñakabarrena Auzoa
description: It is a small parking lot, next to a hermitage, it is very quiet.

title: (48112) Mungia - 1 Carretera Billabaso
description: Nice quiet area with a view of the cows with beautiful bells, a change of scenery

title: (48110) Gatika - 21 Butroi Auzoa
description: Area next to an old restaurant. There are tables for picnic and playground. Good place to spend a night. Very calm.

title: (48110) Gatika - 10 Butron Auzoa
description: Free parking near Butron Castle. No service. Playground for children.

title: (48110) Butroi - 4C Lugar Barrio Butron
description: Place under the trees, apart from the big parking lot, near the river, more quiet during the night, fresher because of the trees. Ground not flat but searching it is possible to find some even spots. Suitable for smaller vehicles.

title: (48110) Gatika - 32 Butron Auzoa
description: Small quiet location for one night. The site is not very clean, trash, used condoms, and we had the visit of the cops ... Nothing serious, simple courtesy visit ... There river does not want at all. But useful for a simple night ...

title: (48111) - 33G Lugar Barrio Mendiondo
description: Quiet parking in nature just after the sanctuary (500m)

title: (48160) Derio - 39N Lugar Barrio San Isidro
description: Nice little parking area in calm area. There is also a lot of parking space a long the street. Used it to be close to the airport.

title: (48160) Derio - N-633
description: LPG/LPG station, public toilets, you have to wash the motorhome, good access...

title: (48160) Derio - 3 BI-3707
description: It is a day and night parking, free and in a VERY quiet area, near the church of San Isidro and the grove of Ganbe. During the day the noise of the airplanes of the airport of Bilbao is listened, but they remit at night. In the car park there are public toilets, which is very good in case there is an intention to spend the night. It is a good place to stop along the way and rest. Near the church there is a bus par bus where several buses go to Bilbao (20-40 mins journey, depending on the line) and Mungia (35mins).

title: (48114) Arrieta - 25 Landaguren Auzoa
description: Area with 2 tables, a barbecue and a fountain with drinking water. Very quiet place for day and night without traffic. Very good views in natural surroundings.

title: (48130) Bakio - 1 Barrio Zubiaurrealde
description: Wide area sheltered from the road. After the car park, a 30m descent cut by a stream. Very quiet, 1 or 2 cyclists in the evening and morning. Mid-morning, 2 or 3 groups of children in camp. Perfect a few minutes from the coast.

title: (48130) Bakio - 5 BI-2101
description: Parking spot. Not nice but allowed, even, and quiet at night. Ideal for a free overnight stay.

title: (48130) Bizkaia - Goisoloalde auzoa
description: Stopped earlier at the end of the spruce avenue from Bakio, the path further is not possible with a camper 7.20 m. Here 2x2 barbeques, 6 picnic tables and drinking water. wonderfully quiet place. little parking space for large campers.

title: (48170) Zamudio - 63 Barrio Arteaga Auzoa
description: Zamudio ongi etorri motorhome area, has gray water emptying services (in the floor grid made for it) black water (only in the area that says WC, on the ground is prohibited), there are two sources to fill water and to be able to drink, the other is exclusive to be able to rinse the potty, there are garbage cans (green-glass, yellow-containers and plastic, blue-cardboard, green-remains) do not throw garbage, and THERE ARE NO BATHROOMS, if you do not have a potty Do not stain your vehicle (village residents complain about the garbage left by some, and the poor use of the area), if the parking space is full, spending the night outside is allowed, but it occupies your space. There is a train 5 minutes away that leaves you in the center of the city, the town has all the services, a gas station nearby, walks, views, and many things to enjoy, planes pass during the day but they usually finish no later than 12 :00 at night, which allows you to rest, the first one is usually 7:00-7:30, so that it does not take you through the narrow area of the park, because one of the streets is cut off, on your gps ( Zamudio Town Hall- and in that same roundabout it indicates the entrance to the area), if you have pets pick up!!!!!!!!!!!! INGO ETORRI ZAMUDIO

title: (48114) Biscay - 36F Lugar Barrio Agirre
description: Quiet place where you can spend the night with good views. a square at the top with flat ground and one or two below.

title: (48170) Zamudio - 2 Leizaola Lehendakaria Enparantza
description: Laundry near the motorhome area, several cleaning and drying machines, waiting area, and payment with coins and card is allowed. Eskerrik asko SCHEDULE- 9:00 in the morning to 9:00 at night, the last service should start at 8:00 in the afternoon.

title: (48130) Bakio - 18C Barrio Elexalde
description: Very nice corner. There is just one stone on the floor missing so there is enough space even for an AC. Flat surface. The unique issue is the access from the road that could be tricky. We stayed with minicaravan.

title: (48950) Erandio - 11 Akarlanda Errepidea
description: Beautiful and magical park where you can spend the night. I came with a caravan. attention to those who travel with pets because it is full of processionaries. for everything else super quiet place, with grills, picnic tables, bathrooms and drinking water. very quiet at night, better during the week. very clean and well maintained space. people are peaceful with caravans and motorhomes.

title: (48170) Zamudio - 6A Torrelaragoiti
description: Shaded picnic area with water, toilets, children's games (including zipline), picnic tables and barbecues. Near a service air for motorhomes. Easy to park next door.

title: (48130) Bakio - Unnamed Road
description: Nice area where we will spend the night. Water and barbecue available with more coal and firelighters. We won't have any use for it tonight, but the gesture of our predecessors is nice. Behind us magnificent eucalyptus, in front, a magnificent view of the sea. Attention Google Map indicates an almost impassable path for 2.5 kms. A motorable road arrives at the same site, you still have to find it.

title: (48620) Biscay - 4C Barrio Urizar
description: The back of the church is a car park with a nice, quiet view and a perfect bear area for kids to play. Field, parking, zip line ...

title: (48120) Emerando -
description: Place to avoid!! We spent the night there with another van, inhabited by a family with 2 young children, like us. During the night, several cars passed, one of them with loud music, and in the end the last car voluntarily crashed into our neighbours' parking lot! With a 4x4 with a bull bar.... At 3am. Savages....

title: (48950) Erandio - 32 Leioa-Unbe Errepidea
description: Camping in this park is strictly forbidden. There is no hidden space to pitch a tent and too many people around. Great for a picnick or barbecue but not for over night stay.

title: (48950) Erandio - 34 Leioa-Unbe Errepidea
description: Park with picnic tables, barbacosas and a fountain. A lot of shade and tranquility.

title: (48130) Bakio - 41B Barrio Zubiaurrealde
description: Parking next to the soccer field for day and night, even concrete floor, very quiet, Eroski supermarket 300 meters away.

title: (48130) Bakio -
description: Recreational area of Mount Jata. Very good views to Bakio and San Juan de Gaztelugatxe. Zone with picnic and barbecues. Very quiet and two minutes from the road by concrete road.

title: (48130) Bakio - BI-3151
description: Splendid panorama on Bakio and the hermitage of Saint Juan de Gaztelugatxe. A few benches, a little shade. For a photo stop. Or a picnic with a view. Or one night because the road does not seem very busy. We are alone this August 17th at 11am.

title: (48130) Bakio - 45B Goienkale kalea
description: Between the pediment, the soccer field and the Eroski supermarket. To spend one or two nights without problem. On the street behind the supermarket you can park more nights. 10 min walking to the beach. In the sports center there are showers and a swimming pool. The txakoligune or txakoli museum is worth a visit

title: (48150) Basozabal - 2 Iturrigane Kalea
description: Automatic laundry, possibility of parking nearby. small supermarket, greengrocer, bars and restaurants. charge cell phone and wifi

title: (48370) Emerando -
description: Small gravel place next to a radio mast on the road. Super quiet, at most a few cars passed by in the evening. There is a good internet connection through the radio mast ;). Watch out in strong winds, it blows you through quite a bit.

title: (48130) - BI-3151
description: Large area with benches, trees to be in the shade, with magnificent views of the islets of Gaztelugatxe.

title: (48150) Biscay - 52 Errekagane Kalea
description: Stop on the same road. Tables and drinking water. Calm. I didn't spend the night, I just stopped to eat because there are tables and water in the shade.

title: (48130) Bakio - 12A Kalea Ibarratorre Kalea
description: Possible parking for motorhome to be able to go swimming or visit the city. 3 minutes from a children's playground and 10 minutes from the beaches and the town on foot.

title: (48650) Barrika - 36BIS Lugar Barrio Musurieta
description: Free water intake for filling at the gas station itself

title: (48130) Bakio - 8F Goienkale kalea
description: Drinking water at a sports field

title: (48630) Gorliz - 35 Artzeta Kalea
description: Eroski car park at the entrance to Gorliz. There are sloping areas and others not.

title: (48130) - Urkitzaurrealde Auzoa
description: Magnificent place in the heart of nature with a view of the sea and San Juan de Gaztlelugatxe. This is my first post on P4N, this place was clean when I arrived, ditto when I left, I hope it will stay that way and that it will not be polluted like many spots on P4N. So please respect this place. For your information, we asked the local police for permission, who confirmed that wild people were allowed in this area. Many other locations available. The entrance to the track is at the bend in the road. It is very visible in satellite vision mode on the P4N map. Obviously, the GPS does not bring to the spot….

title: (48610) Landa - 21 Aita Gotzon Kalea
description: Ecolaundry Laundry

title: (48130) Bakio - 1 Urzabal Kalea
description: Central parking, recommended more for vans or camper up to 7 meters, does not indicate prohibition of motorhomes, there is no height limit. Blue zone payment. ideal to spend the day, not to spend the night. surrounded by residential area. for motorhomes something fair.

title: (48620) Urizar - 13C Lugar Barrio Armintza
description: Place without more services than parking. But spectacular views. Eye must be cold at night because it is attached to the sea.

title: (48610) Landa - 12 Antzonekoa Kalea
description: Parking place in a quiet street of the village

title: (48610) Urduliz - 17 Goieta Kalea
description: Simple parking lot of earth and grass. Water point nearby (climbing site). The view of the sea from a little higher ...

title: (48115) Morga - 1 BI-2713
description: In the middle of the forest, a very quiet farmer's path next to a small river. The path is a bit bumpy.

title: (48130) Bakio - 7 Zarrakoa Bidea
description: Water tap at the end of the pier

title: (48620) Txipio - 14 Geltoki Kalea
description: Parking next to some synthetic courts. It is on the entire shore of the estuary so you can do water activities. There are no prohibitions and you can spend the night. There is noise since it is next to the commuter line.

title: (48130) Bakio -
description: Laundry. Washer and dryer. Open all day and every day of the year.

title: (48130) Bakio - 2 Txirrikaldeko Bidea
description: Large car park surrounded by a green area and 2 minutes from Bakio beach with water, garbage and public toilets, close to shops and restaurants, Bizkaibus terminal that leads to Bilbao and Bermeo, to prefer out of season, for a short time. Possible nautical activities, hiking and mountain biking. Every day, around 9 o'clock, a baker comes. Parking for motorhomes only in the upper part of the parking lot.

title: (48130) Baquio -
description: Quite large parking, it is paid but it is worth it to go to the beach. Little crowded and quiet beach outside the tourist area. 2.30 maximum height. For 6 euros you can stay all day.

title: (48130) Bakio - 37002 Kalea San Pelaioko Bide Nagusia
title_short: (48130) Bakio - 37002 Kalea San Pelaioko Bide Nagusia
description: Free parking along the street (indicated with blue stripes), a good option for those who just want to spend the day and not park in the area for paid AC. Close to the different drops to the beach!

title: (48620) Armintza - 16 Armintzekalde Kalea
description: Sea view parking in the small town of Armitza between Getxo and Bermeo. Quiet in the evening. Small supermarket at the port. No service but a fountain.

title: (48620) Lemoiz - 17 BI-3151
description: Ample parking with picnic area, public bath and next to the beach. No height restriction and no prohibition signs. The beach is not nice. The area is very quiet.

title: (48620) Armintza - 2B Erbera Kalea
description: Large dirt parking at the entrance of the town, close to all shops. It is not pretty but it is ideal for visiting Armintza.  There is a large sign that warns that housing will be created in the future on the parking lot, but for now it is still accessible.

title: (48630) Gorliz - 7 Iberre Zeharbide Kalea
description: Paid laundry.

title: (48130) Baquio -
description: Parking not too far from the beach and amenities and very quiet sufficient for small motorhome less than 6m. paid by parking meter.

title: (48015) Bilbo - 55A Egirleta Errepidea
description: Picnic area of Mount Avril. Ample well leveled parking. With tables, barbecues and a fountain.

title: (48630) Plentzia - 24 Arteandi Plaza
description:
Axpe Kalea.
Quiet little street for short campers to rest in a more straight ground for the night. 
Pay parking from 10am to 8pm, night for free.
No services. Water is findable in the neighborhood, like at any places in Basque Country.
Containers a couple of steps downhill. 
We slept there for the night and paid the parking for the whole day and we had no problem. Just no camping, parking.

title: (48620) Plentzia - 7 Eleiz Enparantza Plaza
description: Laundry in the old town. Do not access with vehicle

title: () - 4 Artxandamendi Bidea
description: Parking and location great. However, you should not leave the camper alone. Our camper was broken into the day we were in town.

title: (48130) Bakio - 80A Kalea San Pelaioko Bide Nagusia
title_short: (48130) Bakio - 80A Kalea San Pelaioko Bide Nagusia
description: Paying parking in the day facing the sea, also used for a residence. We spent the night without paying, the police went in the morning when we left without telling us anything. Nice view, flat and calm; wc and trash from the beach nearby. A 2min walk to bathe

title: () Bilbo - 2 Artxandamendi Bidea
description: Street and parking near the funicular of Bilbao, price 0.95 the trip, near Guggenheim. Sports center of Artxanda (swimming pools) and 2 bars - restaurants on the side.

title: (48004) Biscay - 41G Santamarine Errepidea
description: Stone car park next to the Santa Marina hospital. Quiet place to spend the night and continue the route. A GR from Bilbao passes here. Many trails for walking and mountain biking. Buses to the center of Bilbao every 30 minutes. Do not leave valuables.

title: (48620) Plentzia - 1 Ibiltokia Ibilbidea
description: Parking inside the village of Plentzia, quiet place to spend the night. The only drawback is the chimes of the church. Playground right next door.

title: (48630) Górliz -
description: Water tap at the skatepark

title: (48630) Gorliz -
description: It is forbidden to camp, to spend the night or to park more than 24 hours.

title: (48960) Galdakao - 4A Vivero Errepidea
description: Large car park surrounded by nature, picnic area and bar. Perfect for biking, walking with children and with dogs.

title: (48010) Bilbo - 4 Aretxabaleta Bidea
description: Very nice parking in a picnic area with children's park, fountains, forest and great views. Very comfortable, nice and quiet.

title: (48130) Bakio -
description: Flat course on the ridge you can hear the cars in the valley and bikes regularly come along the path.

title: (48450) Etxebarri - Unnamed Road
description: Nice picnic area with many tables and barbecue areas, it also has a source of drinking water, garbage and a small stream. With an incredible viewpoint, perfect to spend the day or even the night. The access is almost all paved, except the last section that is unpaved, but it can be accessed without problem.

name: Camping Arrien Gorliz
title: (48630) Camping Arrien Gorliz
description:
Quiet campsite 800 meters from the beach. When we arrive it's full but they offer us a temporary site and they put us in the right place the next day just at the entrance.
Services and showers acceptable.
They have a supermarket, although in the city there are cheaper.
Very friendly and super attentive staff.
I would repeat

title: (48007) - 98C Lezamako Trenbide Zaharreko Bidea
description: Parking with free picnic area. About six sites. Well connected although far from the center, about 20 minutes by public transport.

title: (48004) Bilbao - 33D Arbolantxa Bidea
description: Free parking, 10 minutes by bike from the center. Not for sleeping, because along the road, don't watch either.

title: (48195) Larrabetzu - 15 Goikola Auzoa
description: Area open at the end of March 2021. Draining of black and gray water, and a tap with good drinking water pressure. A few meters away are the 5 places. The center of Larrabetzu is about 350 m away. About 200m there are bins.

title: (48950) Erandio - 14 Fano Auzoa
description: We were looking for a place to spend the night near Bilbao in the van. The place is very quiet, beautiful views. We spend the night on a Saturday and in the morning hunters park but without a problem. It is the end of the road and there is room for a van or two. The place is fine just in case you want to stay overnight to spend the day in Bilbao. In theory there are picnic areas according to a poster but I did not see them the time I was there.

title: (48007) Bilbao - 98B Lezamako Trenbide Zaharreko Bidea
description:
Free quiet and flat street parking. 
Really hard to find anywhere in Bilbao....every place full.
I parked pretty stealthily.
It has incredible views of Bilbao.
Easy access to the centre, a series of 3 glass outdoor lifts take you down. Then go across the road and go straight down narrow st to where road forks and see on the left outdoor escalators....remember these as you will need them for the way back up.

title: (48007) Bilbo - 81 Lezamako Trenbide Zaharreko Bidea
description: A great place with a view of the city. Free for day and night. Bus stop nearby. ttle traffic. no height limit.

title: (48630) Gorliz - 18a Urezarantza Ibiltoki Errepidea
description: Paid parking from 9 a.m. to 7 p.m. at the end of the beach, at the entrance to the hospital. Night of 08/21/18 and stay the next day. In the morning, I asked a few police officers who had passed by and they confirmed that there was no problem as long as it did not exceed 24 hours. Do not occupy more than one square or invade the sidewalks. There is a maximum height barrier (2m) but it was open. Forbidden to motorhomes

title: (48309) Errigoiti - 17 Zallobante Auzoa
description: Very quiet, fairly level parking lot, next to a road with little traffic. However, in the center of the village. There are local dogs barking and the church ringing but very quiet place. Benches, barbecue area and water available.

title: (48630) Gorliz - 18A Urezarantza Ibiltoki Errepidea
description: Parking, close to the beach, barriers at 2.20 m high.

title: (48940) Leioa - 15C Mendibil Kalea
description: Simple authorized parking. No services. Quiet at night. Near Bilbao airport whose first plane passes over the city at 7 o'clock. Location monitored by local police.

title: (48007) Bilbo - 19 Ricardo Arregui Kalea
description: Good and safe parking. Ticket via a ticket machine from 09:00. Free on holidays and weekends. 15 minutes walk from the Guggenheim Museum or the city center. For late risers, however, with public transport (buses) but noisy enough to stay.

title: (48195) Larrabetzu - 4 Lehendakari Agirre Kalea
description: Parking near the center and quiet. Very beautiful city with an atmosphere. Spend a night, it's great. They say nothing to spend the night.

title: (48309) Errigoiti - 16B Lugar Barrio Metxika
description: Pretty parking of a church next to a playground and a soccer field.

title: (48130) Bakio -
description: Little clearing on the side of the road, surrounded by woods and meadow. Right next to a hiking trail that leads to a beautiful ocean lookout!

title: (48007) Bilbo - 18 Uribarri Kalea
description: Laundry

title: (48650) Barrika - 9002 Goierri Errepidea
description: Quiet area with water source. Parking areas maybe you can stay overnight because there are motorhomes

title: (48015) Bilbao - 107A Berrizbidea
description: A small path with a picnic table, passable van (very wide road) very quiet at night. Nice view of Bilbao.

title: (48004) Bilbo - 30 Jesus Galindez Hiribidea
description: Free parking area, low slope and very quiet. Public toilet (self-cleaning) and fountain. Bus: Line 03 day and night bus G2 that leaves you at the town hall. Subway stop very close.

title: (48007) Bilbo - 20 Epalza Kalea
description: Self Service Laundry 8-22

title: (48014) Bilbo - 53 Ugasko Bidea
description: Quiet , steep road , great for parking camper to visit Bilbao center- lots of spaces when all other options on park4night were rammed…. pleasant 15 min walk to Guggenheim through university grounds and riverside. Seemed very safe , 2-3  less steep places at top of this dead end road where you could probably pitch down for the night

title: (48650) Elexalde - 6002 Yonakone Kalea
description: Parking in a small village, 20 places. View of the sea, church and tennis courts. Local bar at 100 meters. Parking is along the road and flat spots. Several walking routes are available along the coast and secluded coves. The parking has no facilities.

title: (48005) Bilbao - Etxebarria Parkea
description:
Douches publiques au milieu du parc, comme des douches de plages (pas de cabines). Gratuit.
Proche de toilettes publiques gratuites.

title: (48130) Bakio - 76 Gibelorratzagako San Pelaio Auzoa
description: Lawn space just after the cemetery, we slept here with two other vans without bothering each other. Continuing the road there are two other areas reported in the app. The first was full and only two vans could enter while the second, further down, we were unable to reach because it was only for 4x4s.

title: (48009) Bilbo - 42 Uribitarte Pasealekua
description: Paid parking area along Uribitarte Pesoalekoa Avenue, 100 meters from the Guiguenheim Museum. Many places arriving at 10 am, early October ...

title: (48650) Elexalde - 7A Ayuntamiento Errepidea
description: Small parking (about 10 spaces) next to the parish, very quiet and very very clean public toilets! Quiet area far from any road

title: (48130) Bakio - 76 Gibelorratzagako San Pelaio Auzoa
description: It is a very small parking lot for 5 or 6 motorhomes. At the lake, there are several parking lots prohibited for motorhomes and in summer 2018 access to other motorhome parking lots is cut by the works. Quiet area with bathroom next door and a very good restaurant. Small vehicle only

title: (48006) Bilbo - 47 Zumalacarregui Hiribidea
description: For a one night stay, from 5pm to 9am paid 3.1 euros very quiet. 1300 m from the old city center. For the Campîg because we pay direct until the next day but considering the price it's fine. Next to the church nuestra señora de Begoña. Calm . A little sloping but with perfect calles

title: (48450) Etxebarri - 3M Lekua Barrio Kukullaga
description: Parking next to the cemetery, very quiet. Nearby bar and mountain views.

title: (48600) Sopela - 2 Etxebarri Zeharbide
description: Perfect place to take a shower.

title: (48940) Leioa - 33 Peruri Auzoa
description: Shopping center parking

title: (48370) Bermeo - 35DUP Kalea Arene Pelaio Deuna
description: A small and quiet place with sunset view and view on bakio next to a small road which leads to an impassable road, so no cars pass. We stayed there for a night by ourselves without any problems and enjoyed the peace and quiet.

title: (48014) Bilbo - 7 Ganeta Monte Kalea
description: At the entrance of Bilbao above a small residential area. Three levels of parking. Not explicitly for mobile homes, but there are several large vans here. 20 minute walk to the Guggenheim Museum. Supermarket in the immediate vicinity. Quiet. Very crowded in the evening.

title: (48009) Bilbo - 4C Abandoibarra Etorbidea
description: Parking in green area of payment, to visit the Guggenheim Museum, tram stop nearby

title: (48650) Elexalde - 13 Ayuntamiento Errepidea
description: Parking in the street tolerated, quiet and facing the sea. sloping road.

title: (48600) Sopelana - 31 Loroño Kalea
description: Parking at the entrance of the town. In 5 minutes you are in the center, with bakery, laundry, bars, supermarkets .... Quiet area except at the end of June that are employer holidays. There are always parked motorhomes.

title: (48009) Bilbo - 68 Mazarredo Zumarkalea
description: Underground pay parking limited to 2m10, 2 steps from the Guggenheim.

title: (48600) Sopela - 26D Gatzarriñe Kalea
description: Free parking for motorhomes of all sizes, with no height limit. Available from June to October, only. Adjoining service area. Electricity available, 3€/12 h. You can buy the token at the Turist Office, 10 min walk, see description of the nearest service area.

title: (48650) Elexalde - 16 Ayuntamiento Errepidea
description: Very quiet and cozy parking lot, it gets crowded during the day, bars very close in case you need anything.

title: (48940) Leioa - 19 Dendariena Kalea
description: Self-service laundry. Open 365 days from 08: 00-22: 00. It has 2 washing machines of 20 kg, one of 10 kg, 2 dryers of 20 kg. There are two loading and unloading areas in front of the door for parking. You can pay with your mobile with the Ecolaundry App, it has a change machine and in 1 hour the laundry is clean and dry. all very clean. next door there are several bars to have a drink while doing the laundry and opposite a CarrefourExpress. It is the cheapest in the whole area.

title: (48940) Leioa - 1A San Bartolome Kalea
description: Picnic area next to the Hermitage of San Bartolomé

title: (48014) Bilbo - 12 Heliodoro de la Torre Kalea
title_short: (48014) Bilbo - 12 Heliodoro de la Torre Kalea
description: Parking Madariaga | iPark - Paid parking recommended for campers/AC max 3 meters high. But we made sure that the camper was safe, after reading other places in Bilbao. There is a supermarket nearby to replace food. It is about 15 minutes walk from the center. Very happy with the experience. Public toilets and clearly indicate that you cannot stay overnight.

title: (48600) Sopela - 1 Urgitxieta Kalea
description: Service area for discharge of gray and black water. The black drain is somewhat hidden, it is a sewer with a small round lid, next to the fountain. Parking meters away. No height limit. From October to May, motorhomes and vans over 5m prohibited, but you can park in the big parking next to the service area, where there's also electricity. To take water or/and connect to electricity you have to buy a token in the turist office nearby. Oficina de Turismo Sopela (next to train station Larrabasterra, 10 min walk) July August: h. 10:00-15:00 /16:00-19:00

title: (48910) Sestao - 1C Etorbidea Kaiku
description: Free parking for cars, but suitable for campers. surface is not very even, made of gravel but ok to spend a night or two. no services. best to park at the bottom right by the river.

title: (48370) Bermeo - 35DUP Kalea Arene Pelaio Deuna
description: Space for a flatbed van or 4x4, with a view of the ocean. Quiet place despite the road just below. You have to walk to access life since there are rocks. Easy access. No place for a motorhome.

title: (48014) Bilbo - 19 Araneko Bidea
description: Parking along the street. Great for parking during the day and traveling to Bilbao center on foot or by bike.

title: (48950) Bizkaia - 47A Etorbidea Axpeko Erribera
description: Parking next to the Metro station.

title: (48130) Bakio -
description: A beautiful place to stay overlooking the ocean. Spent a very quiet night there. A few hikers walked by in the morning. Attention: The place can only be reached with a 4x4 vehicle with sufficient ground clearance! There are quite big stones and holes on the way.

title: (48004) Bilbo - 82BIS Iturriaga Kalea
description: Self-service laundry

title: (48014) Bilbo - 40 Agirre Lehendakariaren Etorbidea
description: Payed parking during the day which seems (based upon the stories we read on the internet) comparably safe to the other parking lots in Bilbao. We parked our van directly behind the bus stop, a lot of people are coming by and parts of the bordering house are secured by CCTV.

title: (48600) Sopela - 4A Ingestabaso Kalea
description: On street paid parking 10.00-20.00 use the app to pay, 60 cents per hour. We also parked overnight for free, no problems, some passing traffic until midnight. Beach 5 minutes walk away. None of the “no >5m” signs seen in parking spots closer to the beach.

title: (48015) Bilbao - 10 BI-711
description: Paid parking during the day (OTA-ORA) in the area next to the river. industrial area, quiet and empty at night but busy during the day. There is a metro station nearby, you can walk to the city center (20 minutes)

title: (48940) Leioa - 60 Euzko Gudariak Etorbidea
description: Parking Pinosolo, in Leioa. Quiet area, next to some swimming pools. It can be a suitable place to park and be able to get close to Bilbao.

title: (48004) Bilbo - 2009 Kalea Club Deportivoren Zirko Amateurraren
title_short: (48004) Bilbo - 2009 Kalea Club Deportivoren Zirko Amateurraren
description: Juanito parking at the sports center

name: Camping Sopelana
title: (48600) Camping Sopelana
description: Camping Sopelana. Nice location, friendly staff. Unfortunately, everything is relatively tight. The toilet has been renovated, WiFi only near the restaurant.

title: (48901) Barakaldo - 14A Altos Hornos de Vizcaya Hiribidea
title_short: (48901) Barakaldo - 14A Altos Hornos de Vizcaya Hiribidea
description: Washing drying. behind this building (river side) there are public toilets.

title: (48370) Bermeo - Unnamed Road
description: Parking, area with benches and observation platform next to the road with about 10 parking spaces and a fantastic view. Stay here one night without any problem, 15min walk from the route of the hermitage of Gaztelugatxe.

title: (48640) Berango - 12 Arebeta Bidea
description:
Parking in a commercial park without any type of service.
There are simply many squares, it is well leveled.
Nothing more than a place to stay with gas station, supermarket and fast food.

title: (48600) Sopela - 36b Ingestabaso Kalea
description: Online Parking. no ban. something on a slope in some section of the street. OTA is paid during the day (REGULATED PARKING)

title: (48370) Bermeo - 22 Ander Deun Kalea
description: Parking located a few minutes from downtown. There are car parks located under a bridge to avoid the rain. There is a fountain in the same parking lot. The car parks are quite sloping, so I don't know if it's a good place to spend the night, but it's good for visiting the town.

title: (48009) Bilbo - 78 José Anselmo Clavé Pasealekua
description: Paid parking from 9h to 20h on working days. Free on weekends and at night. Places are close to a large park and the city center. However, there is some traffic and street lighting.

title: (48003) Bilbao - 22 Bailén Kalea
description: Only vans and campers. Paid parking at the train station. Very well located both to visit the Guggenheim museum and the historic center on foot. We came in the big week and after seeing many comments about where to park safely and going around to make sure, we came here and it was great.

title: (48640) Berango - 10A Arebeta Bidea
description: Parking without services, quiet the night we spent the night we were 9 motorhomes and vans.

title: (48640) Biscay - 20D Arebeta Bidea
description: LPG gas supply at Repsol gas station

title: (48014) Bilbo -
description: Street parking, only OTA Bilbao payment (city hall parking), quite flat. Street a bit noisy, but quiet at night. Right next to the bike path, walking access (20 ') to the monumental Bilbao and the Guggenheim museum

title: (48004) Bilbo - 20 Cocherito de Bilbao Kalea
description: Parking Near the Center of Bilbao

title: (48600) Sopela - 12 Goikoetxe Kalea
description: The parking lot next to the beach is only for Vans maximum 5 m. Do not pass motorhomes because they are fined. Park at this point. The beach is worth it

title: (48640) Biscay - 11002 Arebeta Bidea
description: Self-service laundry of the Ecolaundry company, within the Eroski shopping center. Open from Monday to Saturday from 10 a.m. to 10 p.m.

title: (48003) Bilbo - 7 Urazurrutia Kalea
description: Parking in the green zone. Near the market hall.

title: (48600) Sopela - 8002 Kukullu Kalea
description: Parking near one of the beaches of Sopela. Superb view of the beach and the ocean. No height restriction, but width (2.9m) and length (5m). I stayed here for one night with a California with no problem. Paid parking between 10am-8pm. Busy on weekends, also with lots of cars passing through the night. Good during the week. Beach showers nearby, as well as toilets (open between 10 a.m. and 8 p.m.). A few bars and restaurants as well.

title: (48014) Bilbo - Carmelo Bernaola Kalea
description: Very cheap dayparking 2.40 4 hours and still a step away from the metro or bus. Max hands 100 seats plus the one from offline.

title: (48901) Barakaldo - 1 Kalea el Barracon
description: Free parking near the train station. Large vans and motorhomes enter. It is quiet and safe against robberies because the guardia civil is in front.

title: (48370) Bermeo - 14C Bidea Mikel Deuna
description: Park with non-threaded drinking fountain with parking.

title: (48450) Bizkaia - Fuenlabrada Kalea
description: Perfect place for sightseeing of the city. 24h parking costs 70 cents provided you have a ticket for the metro when paying for the parking lot. However, this must not be too old 1h limit. So perfect for staying the night and then going into town the next day. We parked there and were out and about in the city at night, but then you have to drive to another station to get the parking discount. ATTENTION! There is a water treatment plant right next door so it smells a bit like chlorine and it's a bit noisy. Shops such as a supermarket and bars are also in the immediate area

title: (48370) Bermeo - 16B Kalea Arene Pelaio Deuna
description: Free parking day and night.

title: (48013) Bilbo - 18 Ventosa Bidea
description: Directly at the soccer stadium. Area has camera surveillance. Save place. Great location.

title: (48370) Bermeo - 8 Urbanizacion Baratz Eder
description: Standard location to empty grey water. Can also stay the night.

title: (48360) Mundaka - 3 Goitiz Auzoa
description: Very quiet place on the edge of a road. Earth.

title: (48992) Getxo - 1B Kalea Particular de Aiboa
description: Quiet street where we are parked several motorhomes. We arrived in Getxo on a Saturday morning and the port area was saturated. Taking a few turns we find this street. We made it through the night without a hitch.

title: (48370) Bermeo - 1A Kalea Elkano Tar Juan Sebastian
title_short: (48370) Bermeo - 1A Kalea Elkano Tar Juan Sebastian
description: Laundry attached to the Eroski supermarket . washing and drying.

title: (48370) Bermeo - 9 Baratz Eder Urbanizazioa
description: Large and very quiet parking next to the Bermeo sports center / swimming pool and some skateboarding tracks. At about 50 m there is a Dia% supermarket and a motorhome area with free water filling service, emptying of gray and black water, however, the motorhome parking in that area is quite difficult to maneuver and the spaces are too much little.

title: (48012) Bilbo - 7 Irala Kalea
description: Automatic laundry near the guarded parking. Economical! Washing 9kg, 12kg, 15kg. Dryer 18 min. Vending machine for food and drinks. Possibility to recharge the phone

title: (48940) Leioa - 84 Euzko Gudariak Etorbidea
description: Parking next to a school, for the summer it is good to spend a night, very quiet, an area without noise or lights. Next to it there is a park (the artaza park) for a walk. There is no service.

title: (48940) Leioa - 1B Kalea Gabriel Aresti
description: Parking next to the Metro. Gratuit

title: (48012) Bilbo - 1 Vista Alegre Kalea
description: Very central, parking with possibility of spending the night. Monitored 24h. No Services. Ideal to visit Bilbao on foot. Easy to reach even with an RV of 7,5m long and 3,20 high.

title: (48370) Bermeo -
description: Spectacular views of Bermeo, an ideal place to stop and eat. At night it is not ideal as it is next to the road

title: (48004) Bilbo - 8 Lidon Jose Maria Kalea
description: Not surrounded by nature as such - it’s a city park. BUT it’s very close to the Center of Bilbao and is very quiet at night. Few other campers with Spanish registration plates so I think it’s a good place to camp for a night or two with no problems. You have to drive up a very, very steep hill but my 3.5 tonne van did it no trouble :)

title: (48013) Bilbo - 42A Ventosa Bidea
description: Quiet free parking for vans and small caravans, would not recommend for large vehicles. No services, but we have spent the night quietly. You can walk to the city center or take a bus in front of the stadium.

title: (48370) Bermeo - 38M Lugar Urbanizacion Baratz Eder
description: Parking to leave large vehicles such as motorhome or peasant. Street with parking lots.

title: (48003) Bilbo - 2 Juan Carlos de Gortázar Kalea
title_short: (48003) Bilbo - 2 Juan Carlos de Gortázar Kalea
description: We saw several caravans and fires here

title: (48370) Bermeo - 4 Arreskuenaga Kalea
description: Free public toilets and drinking water near children's park.

title: (48993) Getxo - 31 Ollarretxe Kalea
description: Quiet parking without problems. There is always room.

title: (48350) Biscay - 39A Barrio San Bartolomé
description: Very very quiet parking, next to the Ekoetxea biodiversity museum, hardly any vehicles at night, prepared for the disabled, easy access from the road.

title: (48014) Bilbo - 17 Zorrotzaurreko Erribera
description: Lovely quite spot overlooking the river on dead end road. plenty of space for lots of vehicles including trucks.

title: (48012) Bilbo - 2 Ametzola Plaza
description: Perfect safe place to visit the city. When entering, make sure that the entrance is on the left. Parking manager provides a special camper ticket from the machine. Parking costs are 30,- per 24h.

title: (48013) Bilbo - 6 Artsenalbidea
description: Large parking lot next to the estuary. Bike path to Bilbao. Next to the train tracks and the train station, which takes you to the very center of Bilbao. Garbage deposit at the entrance.

title: (48014) Bilbo - 10 De Deustu
description: Free street parking day & night alongside largely disused warehouses beside the river. No height restrictions. Only access via a single bridge (where roadworks ongoing September 2019). No facilities. Relatively quiet since not much down this 'dead end' road, although had one drunk knocking on door in the middle of the night. On a bus route into the city, but can walk to Guggenheim in 20 mins.

title: (48014) Bilbao - 18 Ramal de Olabeaga
description: Parking with fountain. quiet to sleep. Don't ask for much, it is what it is. sleep eat. etc

title: (48014) Bilbo - 3 Olabarrieta Eugenio Plaza
description: Quiet place in a small park without noise. There is usually a place to park with a fountain.

title: (48960) Gumuzio - BI-3732
description: Picnic area with barbecue. Walk possible in the trenches in the forest.

title: (48013) Bilbo - 22A Olabeaga Kaia
description: Online parking by the river. Gratuitous. We arrived in the afternoon and spent the night very quiet after having a splendid dinner at La Lonja Bar. Playground with fountain. Guggenheim Museum in 15 'for a nice walk.

title: (48993) Getxo - 26C Etorbidea Ormaza
description: Self-service laundry of the Ecolaundry company, access is through the entrance of the Repsol Self-service gas station from 8 a.m. to 10 p.m. Last wash at 9 p.m. Open 365 days a year. ￼

title: (48600) Sopela - 31 Solondota Kalea
description: Parking on Sopelana beach, 5 minutes walk from the beach, big parking lot with small playground, bathrooms but now because of covid they are closed. A very closeby bar, where you can use the bathroom. There are drinking fountains and bins. The views from above are impressive. Paid parking during the day. Only for small campers. Longer than 5 meters is NOT allowed, will be turned away by the police!

title: (48960) Elexalde Auzoa - 49 Elexalde Auzoa
description: Car parking in the school and sports area. Large and little occupation. We stayed 1 night because we were caught passing through. Great cider house 100 meters

title: (48993) Getxo - 2 Ibatao Kalea
description: Parking on the street, very close to the metro to visit Bilbao. There is a park nearby. Very quiet area, there is a cafeteria 200m away where they serve spectacular tortilla pinchos.

title: (48350) Busturia - 38D Barrio San Bartolomé
description: Parking lot in a very quiet and relatively flat cemetery. Out of sight.

title: (48013) Bilbo - 17 Luis Briñas Kalea
description: Secured parking garage (Intermodal) for campers up to 2.20m high. A bit tight inside. Ideal for a visit to the Guggenheim Museum, which is about 2km away on foot.

title: (48991) Getxo - 22 Kasune Kalea
description: Txukun Laundry

title: (48940) Leioa - 7 Langileria Kalea
description: Parking near the suspension bridge.

name: Aparcamiento público gratuíto - Aparkalekua
title: (48370) Aparcamiento público gratuíto - Aparkalekua
description: Free parking next to the soccer field and the cemetery. It has a physical height limitation (2.2 m) and a slight unevenness. It has a public toilet, litter bins and rubbish bins.

title: (48013) Bilbo - 19 San Nikolas de Olabeaga Kalea
title_short: (48013) Bilbo - 19 San Nikolas de Olabeaga Kalea
description: Good free parking during the day if you want to visit Bilbao. About 10 to 15 minutes to downtown. We did not sleep here but it seems good for the night as it is so close to the center. Attention access through a tunnel of 2.70m high.

title: (48991) Guecho - Telletxe Kalea
description: Asphalt parking next to the metro station. To spend one night is fine. From Monday to Friday it is paid.
